com.ephesoft.dcma.user.connectivity.impl

Class MSActiveDirectoryConnectivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.user.connectivity.impl.MSActiveDirectoryConnectivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserConnectivityConstant, UserConnectivity

    public class MSActiveDirectoryConnectivity
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserConnectivity, UserConnectivityConstant
    This class connect to the Active Directory server and fetching the result from the Active Directory server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    UserConnectivity
